title: I believe the Indian government pursuing opponents suggest M—di is tilting to authoritatarian.
selftext: Hopefully I won’t get sh+t in Canada for posting this: https://www.cnn.com/2023/10/12/india/india-author-arundhati-roy-sedition-case-intl-hnk/index.html. Note based on what a stat—ist bot told me I amended my post in recognition of the greatness of Mr.Modi, our dear Savior. Lol
comments: In other news, water is wet
In other news Modi is the kinda narcissist to name a stadium after himself.
